name: Backyard Cannons
description:
Classic turn-based 1v1 aim and shoot action!

Compete against a bot, random online player or a friend in a battle of precise shooting! Man a cannon and shoot your opponent, but be wary about the constantly changing wind! Make your adjustments and take the shot!

This game supports online play!

  • Left / Right arrows - turn cannon
  • Up / Down arrows - change shot power
  • Space - shoot
  • Drag your mouse to change turn and shot power, click the cannon to shoot!
